member.name: T:HelpdeskPlugin.Classes.HelpdeskSettings
member.summary: Settings that define how the HelpdeskPlugin module is configured.

member.name: P:HelpdeskPlugin.Classes.HelpdeskSettings.ShowCaptchaText
member.summary: Determines if captcha text is displayed for user input.

member.name: P:HelpdeskPlugin.Classes.HelpdeskSettings.CaptchaWordLength
member.summary: Width of captcha text to be displayed for input, to verify the user is real.

member.name: P:HelpdeskPlugin.Classes.HelpdeskSettings.ShowTickets
member.summary: Determines whether support tickets are displayed on a website or not.
member.value: bool. If true users can obtain support via online support tickets.

member.name: P:HelpdeskPlugin.Classes.HelpdeskSettings.ShowFaq
member.summary: Show frequently asked questions on website.
member.value: bool. If true then frequently asked questions will be displayed.

member.name: P:HelpdeskPlugin.Classes.HelpdeskSettings.ShowFeedback
member.value: bool. If true then feedback will be displayed.

member.name: T:HelpdeskPlugin.Classes.PluginClass
member.summary: Implements IPlugin and IPluginVersion which allows the HelpdeskPlugin module to be loaded as a plugin module

member.name: T:HelpdeskPlugin.Controllers.HelpdeskController
member.summary: Helpdesk controller, provides Helpdesk functionality for any website.
